title: Puck Performance
description:
All's fair in love and potatoes.
Melody BrightlyBroadway Star.Pink hair.A smile that hits me harder than a slap shot.Terrible taste in hockey teams.Full of secrets.The one woman I fail to defend my heart against.Jase DonnellyDefenseman.Charming.Sexy as puck.Makes my hormones give a standing ovation.The one guy I can never be with, but can't stay away from.Our sexy as puck hero may have helped name The Coven but he's about to meet his match in PUCK PERFORMANCE- BTU Alumni #4. He might exaggerate so much he'll end up in the sin bin and there's a chance she'll burst into song, but they'll have you laughing and speaking in shouty capitals. No potatoes were harmed in this HEA-guaranteed interconnected stand-alone
author: Alley Ciz
